title: Class of 2018 Artist Kassi Ashton Talks About Beating Cancer & Getting Out Of California, Missouri + Amy's Struggling With Potty Training Her Son
itunes:title: Class of 2018 Artist Kassi Ashton Talks About Beating Cancer & Getting Out Of California, Missouri + Amy's Struggling With Potty Training Her Son
description:
Class of 2018 artist Kassi Ashton stops by the studio to talk about fighting cancer and making it out of her hometown and Amy shares her struggles with potty training her son
